params.deployer: The PancakeSwap V3 deployer contract address

returns.pool: The contract address of the V3 pool

getPool(address,address,address,uint24).details: Returns the pool for the given token pair and fee. The pool contract may or may not exist.

params.fee: The fee level of the pool
params.tokenA: The first token of a pool, unsorted
params.tokenB: The second token of a pool, unsorted

returns._0: Poolkey The pool details with ordered token0 and token1 assignments

params.deployer: The contract address of the PancakeSwap V3 deployer
params.poolKey: The identifying key of the V3 pool

params.deployer: The contract address of the PancakeSwap V3 deployer
params.fee: The fee collected upon every swap in the pool, denominated in hundredths of a bip
params.tokenA: The contract address of either token0 or token1
params.tokenB: The contract address of the other token

computeAddress(address,SmartRouterHelper.notice: Deterministically computes the pool address given the deployer and PoolKey

getPoolKey(address,address,uint24).notice: Returns PoolKey: the ordered tokens with the matched fee levels

verifyCallback(address,SmartRouterHelper.notice: Returns the address of a valid PancakeSwap V3 Pool

verifyCallback(address,address,address,u.notice: Returns the address of a valid PancakeSwap V3 Pool
